Text:
This game is tested virus free

First when you get the iso file, extract it in a "my computer" subfile then install the game.

Restart your computer and use the crack. 

Replace the game icon with the crack image(they should look identical), a pop up message appears telling you this file already exists...if you want to replace it...you click yes.

Then the rest is magic....
Have fun
